channel.title: Monster making help please
channel.description: hey my friend made a server so i wanted to make one better than his and he keeps going on about a "source" to make the monsters move and have hp. could someone thourghly explain this. lol and if you have tips could i please have them.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 12:54:23 PM[/size][hr]and if it helps any i can spawn monsters by typing ::npc 50 for a KBD but idk how to do things with them. if its the wrong santax whats the right one

item.title: Monster making help please

item.description:

hey my friend made a server so i wanted to make one better than his and he keeps going on about a “source” to make the monsters move and have hp. could someone thourghly explain this. lol and if you have tips could i please have them.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 12:54:23 PM[/size][hr]and if it helps any i can spawn monsters by typing ::npc 50 for a KBD but idk how to do things with them. if its the wrong santax whats the right one
